channel.description: Recent content in News on Brainsation

item.title: 20 GIFs That Show Live News Reporting Isn't Always A Great Idea
item.description: Piximus TV reporters live glamorous lives and we’ve all envied them, just a little, when we’ve seen them reporting from a star-studded event and enjoying the limelight. What many of us haven’t considered is that live-reporting his its dark side too. Live means that you can’t redo a take or reshoot a scene. If things go wrong, the whole world is going to know it. That’s what happens in these 20 hilarious live TV moments.
